title: Brown on Racial Disparity Amidst the COVID-19 Crisis
itunes:title: Brown on Racial Disparity Amidst the COVID-19 Crisis
description:
Tracey Brown, President and CEO of the American Diabetes Association, discusses racial disparity during the coronavirus pandemic. She points out the importance of ensuring that the most vulnerable populations have access to testing. Brown also provides strategies for managing diabetes and stresses the need for the continuity of health care access despite economic turmoil.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.  

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
